TlālocSprinklers

Open source sprinkler contoller.

Sample Interface Get Started

    • //

What is this?

Tlaloc Sprinklers aims to be an open source platform agnostic solution for sprinkler automation and control

Features

  • Ability to control your sprinklers from your phone
  • Cron you sprinklers
  • Configure sprinklers through web interface
  • Won't run when its going to rain

Get Started

install the gem


gem install tlaloc
